name: newyearresolutiontracker
0:
”Alexa, open new years resolution tracker”
”set new years resolution”
”set new resolution”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new years resolution tracker
des:
Let Alexa help you stay on track with your new year's resolution and achieve your goals! Let Alexa know your resolution and then check back in at your own convenience to share how you're doing and hear some words of encouragement! With Alexa's help and your dedication this will be your year! 

***Quick Reference***
-To get started: Alexa, open new years resolution tracker. (And then follow prompts)
-Set or change your resolution: set new years resolution OR set resolution.

~Positive responses will trigger encouragement responses & other responses will tigger motivational responses.
~ Check in daily to keep your streak going, motivation high and for some special/unique streak responses!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
